_header: Man thus on Rood I hang for thee / Forsake thy sin for love of me
Note: For similar lines see 2199, 4275, and 6135; compare also 201.
Title(s): ‘How Crist spekes tyll synfull man of his gret mercy’
_description: ‘How Crist spekes tyll synfull man of his gret mercy’ — six 6-line stanzas

BodRawPoe175.First Lines:
Man þus on rode I hymg for þeffor sake þi syn for
                    luf of me…
BodRawPoe175.Last Lines:
…Man þe same I will do þeþer for lete at my
                    lare
BodRawPoe175.Attributed Title:
Now crist spekes tyll synfull man of his gret mercy (f.
                    93va)

lo hou I hinge on rode for þeforsake þi syn for loue of

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Man þus on rode I hing for þeforsake þi sin for luf
                    of me…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…Man þe same I will do þeþarfore lete at my
                    lare
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Latin rubric above first line, by scribe: ‘In cruce sum pro te
                        . qui peccas desine pro me / desine do neman . dic culpam corrige
                    intam’.
